name: Let it kick!
description: In this Kenney jam 2021 submission your playing football (originally) except there's wrong problem.....you, the ball, the opposing team and the stage are all rotating! Touch and hold to charge up a shot and let go to go kicking in that direction and scoring the ball into the goal!. The game idea is inspired by bleyblades (hence the name let it kick) and all the art is Kenney's and audio is from freesound.org.  If the ball gets stuck tap/click on it to reset its position.
